actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend section 403 (b) of the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to permit the continuation of youth fares.

summary.text: Revises the Federal Avaiation Act of 1958 to permit any air carrier to grant reduced rate transportation to individuals aged 21 and younger.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 403 (b) of the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to permit the continuation of youth fares.
